mapper.select: select t1.id,t1.name,t1.img,t1.href from auth_menu t1 LEFT JOIN auth_menu t2 on t1.id=t2.fid LEFT JOIN auth_menu t3 on t2.id=t3.fid where t3.id in (select menuid from auth_user where userid=#{userid}) OR t1.auth=0 group by t1.id,t1.name,t1.img,t1.href

select t2.id,t2.name,t2.href from auth_menu t1 LEFT JOIN auth_menu t2 on t1.id=t2.fid LEFT JOIN auth_menu t3 on t2.id=t3.fid where t1.id=#{fid} and t2.name !='消息中心' and t3.id in (select menuid from auth_user where userid=#{userid}) OR t1.auth=0 and t2.name is not null GROUP BY t2.id,t2.name,t2.href

select COUNT(t3.id)as con from auth_menu t1 LEFT JOIN auth_menu t2 on t1.id=t2.fid LEFT JOIN auth_menu t3 on t2.id=t3.fid where t3.name=#{name} and t3.id in (select menuid from auth_user where userid=#{userid}) OR t1.auth=0 and t2.name is not null
select id from auth_menu where fid = #{fid} and auth = 1
select id from auth_menu where post = #{post} and grade = #{grade}
select * from auth_menu where default_auth = 1 and grade = #{grade}
